name: dashboard_get_json
description: This function authenticate urls to access S3 tracks through Cloudfront.
readme:
# This document scope is to show how to test the lambda function with the AWS console.
- Access the AWS web interface through the federate link: https://federation-services.doxee.com/adfs/ls/IdpInitiatedSignon.aspx
- Log in with LDAP credentials
- Access the lambda function with the description: "This function is used as a custom authorizer to check API GATEWAY requests and avail or denied access to sub-services."
- Within "Qualifiers" select the version or alias to test
- Click on Actions-> Configure test even
- Insert event_samples/default.json, after have modified the value bucketName with the one specified during the deployment of the architecture as --bucket-name and also the value of distributionCNAME with the value specified with --cname and tableName with the value specified within --db-keys
- Click Save
- Click Test
- Execution should succeed
